text:
A build file which used to work flawlessly with 1.7.0 bundled with Eclipse Europa is broken in Eclipse Ganymede (Ant 1.7.1).

The Ant process is terminated silently without any error messages.

After a lot of wondering and try and error, I found out that the reason was a numeric entity in an echo-task, e.g.:

<echo>© some other text</echo>


After removing the entity, the build file was executed correctly again.
creator: t.weber@torweg.net
bodewig@apache.org
text:
I just committed an AntUnit test with svn revision 720440 and it passes (with trunk and a binary ant 1.7.1 distribution).

so what you see is either a problem with the XML parser or with Eclipse's packaging of the parser or Ant, nothing that the Ant team could help solving since we are not involved with either.
